description:
Create a new client key bound to a project.  The key's secret and
public key are generated by the server.
example_request:
POST /api/0/projects/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/pump-station/keys/ HTTP/1.1
Host: sentry.io
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "name": "Fabulous Key"
}
example_response:
HTTP/1.1 201 CREATED
Content-Length: 906
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Language: en
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Vary: Accept-Language, Cookie
Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS
X-Frame-Options: deny
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "browserSdk": {
    "choices": [
      [
        "latest", 
        "latest"
      ], 
      [
        "4.x", 
        "4.x"
      ]
    ]
  }, 
  "browserSdkVersion": "4.x", 
  "dateCreated": "2018-11-06T21:20:07.941Z", 
  "dsn": {
    "cdn": "https://sentry.io/js-sdk-loader/cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364.min.js", 
    "csp": "https://sentry.io/api/2/csp-report/?sentry_key=cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364", 
    "minidump": "https://sentry.io/api/2/minidump/?sentry_key=cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364", 
    "public": "https://cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364@sentry.io/2", 
    "secret": "https://cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364:4f6a592349e249c5906918393766718d@sentry.io/2", 
    "security": "https://sentry.io/api/2/security/?sentry_key=cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364"
  }, 
  "id": "cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364", 
  "isActive": true, 
  "label": "Fabulous Key", 
  "name": "Fabulous Key", 
  "projectId": 2, 
  "public": "cec9dfceb0b74c1c9a5e3c135585f364",

  "secret": "4f6a592349e249c5906918393766718d"

parameters.description: the name for the new key.
parameters.name: name

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the client keys belong to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the project the client keys belong to.
path_parameters.name: project_slug

title: Create a new Client Key
